actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965, to establish a special annual entrance permit for handicapped persons.

summary.text: Provides, under the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act, for annual entrance permits to be issued to persons 62 years of age or older and to handicapped persons. Entitles such permit holder to use special recreational facilities at a rate of 50 percent of the established daily use fee.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965, to establish a special annual entrance permit for handicapped persons.
